#

> This post is inspired by this you tube video [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YQ2Dd3CSa0U&list=WL&index=54).

## Introuction

Anyone with experience in R can tell you how poorly it handles the output of regression 
models. That data is poorly formatted inadequate for publication. The following code 
illustrates this point with the CO2 Dataset. 

```{R, Example}
data("CO2")
lm(CO2$conc ~CO2$Plant)
```
